Text:
Dear EZTV Thank you so much for all your Hardwork! You are the BEST, hands DOWN! 

If I may ask though, Is there anyway you can start doing ABDC (Americas best dance crew) I would really appreciate it. I love the show and it is hard to find. Thanx again bro!

a/v 10/10 as always when downloading from EZTV :)  I'm gonna have to agree with MyNameIsV, by saying you are the best.... and I second the request for Americas Best Dance Crew, love that show, have no way of watching it at home. Thanks!

I love this show, and really want to see this episode, but I can't play MKV files or MP4 files.  Is there any way you could please upload this episode as a regular 2HD in xvid or avi format?  I'd really appreciate it, thank you!!!
